import React from 'react' const Card = ({ user, toggleFollow }) => { const timestamp = user.timestamp; const timeStampReformat = timestamp.slice(2, 7); return (

{user.username}

{user.name}

{timeStampReformat}

{user.caption}

{user.button_visible &&
toggleFollow(user)}> {user.is_followed? "Following": "Follow"}
}
{user.likes}
{user.comments}
) } export default Card
